overview: A career-spanning live concert. recorded live at Dublin's Point Theatre with Declan Sinnott during 4 nights in December 2005 and January 2006. Tracks 1 - 20 are "The Gig"; tracks 21 - 27 are "The Sound Check" followed by "The Documentary".  Exclusive DVD special features include:  * Documentary - Interview with Christy Moore, reflecting on the tour and his career in general  * Audio Commentary by Christy Moore
tagline: A career-spanning live concert. recorded live at Dublin's Point Theatre with Declan Sinnott during 4 nights in December 2005 and January 2006
title: Christy Moore: Live In Dublin 2006
